attributes.action: Make Victoria Wood and Julie Walters Dames.
attributes.background: Sadly Victoria Wood lost her battle with cancer today without been given the proper recognition she deserved for her services to the entertainment industry so i believe we need to right the wrong and also recognise Julie Walters for her partnership with Victoria and also for her own acting talent.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
